channel.title: Hacker/spammer problems
channel.description:
Ok we have had some guy doing this for a few days now,when you kick it it banned u and it to long to type in.
[img]http://[url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=15&u=12536005][img]http://i73.servimg.com/u/f73/12/53/60/05/5510.jpg[/img][/url][/img]
If any 1 can help please post. :confused:

item.title: Hacker/spammer problems
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

It’s the ‘laughing man’ bot. There’s various ways to remove this, such as only allowing a certain amount of letters/numbers to log in, if not they will be banned.

Read full topic
